SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddingMoodActivity
Activity for adding a new mood event.
CommonSpaceActivity
Activity that displays public moods.
CommonSpaceAdapter
For the "Common Space" screen.
CommonSpaceAdapter.OnFollowListener
Interface to handle follow actions for a mood event.
EditMoodActivity
Activity for editing an existing mood event.
Emotion
Enum representing different types of emotions.
EmotionData
Utility class for retrieving emotion-related data.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FilterKeywordDialog
A DialogFragment that presents a dialog with an EditText for the user to input a keyword to filter items by.
FilterMoodDialog
A DialogFragment that presents a dialog with a list of mood options for the user to select from.
FollowedMoodsActivity
Shows only the moods user has specifically followed.
FollowedMoodsAdapter
For the "Followed Moods" screen.
FollowedMoodsAdapter.OnUnfollowListener
Interface to handle unfollow actions for a mood event.
FolloweesActivity
Displays a list of Followees (people the current user follows).
FolloweesAdapter
Displays a simple list of followees or followed mood data.
FolloweesAdapter.FolloweeViewHolder
ViewHolder class for holding views related to each followee item.
FolloweesAdapter.OnItemActionListener
Interface to handle followed/unfollowed actions on an item in the list.
FollowersActivity
 
FollowersAdapter
 
FollowersAdapter.FollowerViewHolder
 
FollowersAdapter.OnRemoveClickListener
Listener interface for handling the removal of followers.
GlobalData
A naive global store for user-followed moods.
HomeScreenFragment
 
LoginActivity
LoginActivity handles user authentication, including login and registration.
MainActivity
Main activity of the application.
MoodEvent
Represents a mood event that tracks an individual's emotional state and associated information.
MoodHistoryActivity
This activity displays the user's mood history in a RecyclerView.
MoodHistoryAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of mood history events in a RecyclerView.
MoodHistoryAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for binding the views in each item of the RecyclerView.
MoodHistoryTests
Unit tests for the MoodHistory functionality.
ProfileActivity
ProfileActivity displays the user's profile information along with recent mood events.
SocialSituation
Enum representing different social situations that a person might experience during a mood event.
User
Represents a User with a username and password.
UsersFollowedActivity
UsersFollowedActivity manages the display of users that the current user follows.
UsersFollowedAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of users that the current user is following in a RecyclerView.
UsersFollowedAdapter.OnUnfollowClickListener
Interface for handling the unfollow action when the user clicks the unfollow button.
UsersFollowedAdapter.UserFollowedViewHolder
ViewHolder for binding the views in each item of the RecyclerView.
